scripts.test: npm run env -- npm run ci:test
scripts.static: npm run build && npm run export && npm run serve
scripts.export: npm run env -- npm run ci:export
scripts.package: npm run env -- npm run ci:package
scripts.deploy: npm run env -- --use-shell "serverless deploy && npm run ci:export && serverless client deploy --no-confirm --no-delete-contents"
scripts.info: npm run env -- npm run ci:info
scripts.ci:deploy: (timeout 30s serverless deploy || true) && npm run ci:export && serverless client deploy --no-confirm --no-delete-contents
scripts.ci:export: rm -rf out && . ./.scripts/loadDeploymentEnvs && npm run build && next export
